articles.title: Chris Hemsworth 'taking on fewer acting roles' after discovering he is predisposed to Alzheimer's - Daily Mail
articles.description: Chris Hemsworth is said to be taking a huge step back from Hollywood film roles after discovering he is genetically predisposed to Alzheimer's disease.
articles.content:
Chris Hemsworth is said to be taking a huge step back from Hollywood film roles after discovering he is genetically predisposed to Alzheimer's disease.

articles.author: Alex Sherman
articles.title: WWE near deal to be sold to UFC parent Endeavor, sources say - CNBC
articles.description: WWE, which is controlled by Vince McMahon, has spent the past several months looking for a buyer.
articles.content:
Vince McMahon's World Wrestling Entertainment is in advanced talks to be sold to Ari Emanuel's Endeavor Group, the parent company of UFC, according to people familiar with the matter.

articles.author: Claire Anderson
articles.title: Prince Harry signals new income stream with 'designer sponsorship deal' - Express
articles.description: The Duke of Sussex made a surprise return to the UK for the first time since the late Queen's funeral wearing an item from one of Meghan Markle's favorite high-fashion labels.
